page.title: 15Grantully Castle
page.content: { {A interview with Mr.H.Steuart {Fothringham of Grantully Castle. Mr. Fothringham,the owner,has lived in Grantully Castle for twenty years.He moved in on the 1st November 1964.The first part of the castle was built around 1400 and was finally finished in 1890.It was built by{Sir Alexander} {Steuart}of Grantully.It is said by some people that{the first castle}was by St.Mary's Church but other people say it was by the river at Laidneskea. It is very cold sometimes living in the castle,the warmest room is the kitchen because the cooker is always on.If it gets too cold,the only thing to do is put on another coat or light the fire. In the{dungeon}it is very damp and there are no windows.It is very small and about 4feet under ground level.
